    if (canShoot)

        LaunchBullet();

    if bullets > 0 and not is_reloading():
        launch_bullet()
    
    if bullets == 0 or is_reloading():
        play_clack_sound()

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    if (bullets > 0 && !IsReloading())
    {
        LaunchBullet();
    }
    
    if (bullets == 0 || IsReloading())
    {
        PlayClackSound();
    }
